comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
The parcels Post Office at Railway Square (opened 1913) is under construction - see Persistent URL.  Which implies this photo is c.1912.

Also the tram pylons in the centre of George Street are no longer there. They were removed in about 1908 to enable wider bodied trams.
